content: purchasable pdf pattern https //www etsy com/listing/681880911/pink-single-crochet-baby-sweater-pattern free printable version of pattern which can be saved as a pdf available at the bottom of this page https //daisyfarmcrafts com/pink-single-crochet-baby-sweater/ youtube tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=rkrxmex6oti materials * 3 skeins of pink hobby lobby i love this cotton * 1 skein of white hobby lobby i love this cotton * size h hook * tapestry needle * stitch markers * scissors * button s optional
